thetext:
The state-of-the-art fitness center at Redwood Manor blends cutting-edge equipment with scenic views of the surrounding redwoods.

Members enjoy access to top-tier cardio and strength-training machines, a private studio for yoga and group classes, and on-site personal trainers to support individualized wellness goals. Itâ€™s a space designed to inspire both performance and balance.
